transcript.speaker: Choose a format
transcript.dialogue: Regular Table Indented Condensed

transcript.speaker: Space Ghost
transcript.dialogue: (invisos in to set) Hello! And behold, for I am the Space Ghost. King of space and all that it contains.

transcript.speaker: Zorak
transcript.dialogue: Question.

transcript.speaker: Space Ghost
transcript.dialogue: On tonight's crude mix of animation and jarring live action footage, we have Tyra Banks...

transcript.speaker: Zorak
transcript.dialogue: Question.

transcript.speaker: Space Ghost
transcript.dialogue: No questions, please. And, Rebecca Romijn.

transcript.speaker: Zorak
transcript.dialogue: Question.

transcript.speaker: Space Ghost
transcript.dialogue: Please hold all questions until after the show.

transcript.speaker: Zorak
transcript.dialogue: Statement?

transcript.speaker: Space Ghost
transcript.dialogue: No statements, thank you.

transcript.speaker: Zorak
transcript.dialogue: Comment?

transcript.speaker: Space Ghost
transcript.dialogue: I have no comment at this time. Thank you all for coming.

transcript.speaker: Zorak
transcript.dialogue: (stares)

transcript.speaker: Space Ghost
transcript.dialogue: (looks at Zorak)

transcript.speaker: Zorak
transcript.dialogue: I am Zorak! Dark lord of inequity! Bow down before me!

transcript.speaker: Space Ghost
transcript.dialogue: (looks at Zorak)

transcript.speaker: Zorak
transcript.dialogue: (sighs, looks away)

transcript.speaker: Space Ghost
transcript.dialogue: Please welcome my first guest, Tyra Banks! (waits for monitor to lower, nothing happens)

transcript.speaker: Zorak
transcript.dialogue: (off camera) (terrible keyboard noise) Argggh! Shoot it! (Rags is sitting on Zorak's keyboard) Shoot it! (Rags makes sounds by walking on keyboard)

transcript.speaker: Space Ghost
transcript.dialogue: Zorak, that's no way to greet our new director.

transcript.speaker: Zorak
transcript.dialogue: (peeks up from pod, with Rags still lying on keyboard) Where's Moltar?

transcript.speaker: Space Ghost
transcript.dialogue: Who? Oh, I traded him.

transcript.speaker: Zorak
transcript.dialogue: For this hairy pile of meat? (Rags finally jumps down from keyboard)

transcript.speaker: Space Ghost
transcript.dialogue: This "hairy pile of meat", Zorak, is a highly skilled director, with impeccable comic timing. (Rags walks over and lays down in front of Space Ghost's desk) Not to mention he can clean his entire body using only his tongue. Which is more than I can say for Jerktar.

transcript.speaker: Zorak
transcript.dialogue: Dog's can't direct.

transcript.speaker: Space Ghost
transcript.dialogue: And mantises can't play keyboards, right?

transcript.speaker: Zorak
transcript.dialogue: (plays keyboard, it makes terrible noises)

transcript.speaker: Space Ghost
transcript.dialogue: Zorak, break time is over.

transcript.speaker: Zorak
transcript.dialogue: (continues playing noises)

transcript.speaker: Space Ghost
transcript.dialogue: (aims power bands, all of a sudden noises are replaced by pop instrumental music) (smiles)

transcript.speaker: Zorak
transcript.dialogue: (starts playing noises again)

transcript.speaker: Space Ghost
transcript.dialogue: (blasts Zorak with destructo ray)

transcript.speaker: Zorak
transcript.dialogue: (coughs)

transcript.speaker: Space Ghost
transcript.dialogue: Mm! (dramatic music in background) This dog, who they said couldn't direct, is gonna take this show, which they said couldn't be done, and turn it into a show (Rags jumps up on Space Ghost's desk) that has never been done. (stands up) Before. (to Rags) Go get Tyra! (Rags jumps down) That's a boy!

transcript.speaker: Zorak
transcript.dialogue: So... who'd ya trade Moltar to?

transcript.speaker: Announcer
transcript.dialogue: (says a bunch of Japanese stuff) ... MOL-TAR!

transcript.speaker: Moltar
transcript.dialogue: (in dugout) Huh?

transcript.speaker: Zorak
transcript.dialogue: You got ripped. (laughs)

transcript.speaker: Space Ghost
transcript.dialogue: Oh yeah? Well, how about I also received Mookie Wilson, Omar Moreno, and a bag of cats.

transcript.speaker: Zorak
transcript.dialogue: Oh, where are they? Break 'em out!

transcript.speaker: Space Ghost
transcript.dialogue: Well, Mookie and Omar decided to sleep in...

transcript.speaker: Zorak
transcript.dialogue: Yeah, yeah, yeah, what about the cats?

transcript.speaker: Space Ghost
transcript.dialogue: What cats?

transcript.speaker: Zorak
transcript.dialogue: They gave you cats, right?

transcript.speaker: Space Ghost
transcript.dialogue: Yeah!

transcript.speaker: Space Ghost
transcript.dialogue: Please welcome my first guest, Tyra Banks! (waits for monitor to lower, nothing happens)

transcript.speaker: Zorak
transcript.dialogue: (stares at Space Ghost)

transcript.speaker: Space Ghost
transcript.dialogue: (invisos to control room) (to Rags) That was your cue.

transcript.speaker: Rags
transcript.dialogue: (walks away)

transcript.speaker: Space Ghost
transcript.dialogue: Good idea, you go familiarize yourself with the manual and... I'll just get you started. (walks up to control room monitor) Zorak, where's the lever?

transcript.speaker: Zorak
transcript.dialogue: I am Zorak! Dark Lord of...

transcript.speaker: Space Ghost
transcript.dialogue: Whatever. (presses a button, gets shocked & thrown back. Tyra appears)

transcript.speaker: Tyra Banks
transcript.dialogue: (laughs)

transcript.speaker: Space Ghost
transcript.dialogue: (sitting on floor) Tyra?

transcript.speaker: Tyra Banks
transcript.dialogue: Yes.

transcript.speaker: Space Ghost
transcript.dialogue: (flies back to his desk)

transcript.speaker: Tyra Banks
transcript.dialogue: (blows kiss to Zorak)

transcript.speaker: Zorak
transcript.dialogue: (starts wheezing and panting)

transcript.speaker: Space Ghost
transcript.dialogue: (bounds into his chair) Ladies and gentlemen - shut up, Z...

transcript.speaker: Tyra Banks
transcript.dialogue: Hello universe, my name is Tyra Banks.

transcript.speaker: Space Ghost
transcript.dialogue: Ty-ra. Ra! That's the Egyptian sun god. So, I guess that makes you Egyptian.

transcript.speaker: Tyra Banks
transcript.dialogue: Actually, well, I'm, I -

transcript.speaker: Space Ghost
transcript.dialogue: Here's something about your culture you probably don't know. Ra is actually short for Roger.

transcript.speaker: Tyra Banks
transcript.dialogue: I think it's really nice it's -

transcript.speaker: Space Ghost
transcript.dialogue: Also a sports term which, translated roughly, means, "Cheers". Did you ever watch that show? It was pretty good.

transcript.speaker: Tyra Banks
transcript.dialogue: (opens her mouth to talk)

transcript.speaker: Space Ghost
transcript.dialogue: Here's something else you might not know. "Cheers" was filmed in front of a live studio audience.

transcript.speaker: Tyra Banks
transcript.dialogue: (nods) Well, we have like some kind of space -

transcript.speaker: Space Ghost
transcript.dialogue: Although I don't know if I believe that.

transcript.speaker: Tyra Banks
transcript.dialogue: Well, I -

transcript.speaker: Space Ghost
transcript.dialogue: Seriously I don't.

transcript.speaker: Tyra Banks
transcript.dialogue: But it's not -

transcript.speaker: Space Ghost
transcript.dialogue: That reminds me of a story I think you'll find fascinating.

transcript.speaker: Space Ghost
transcript.dialogue: I would like one stamp, please.

transcript.speaker: Mail Room Guy
transcript.dialogue: That'll be thirty-two cents.

transcript.speaker: Space Ghost
transcript.dialogue: I don't have any money.

transcript.speaker: Space Ghost
transcript.dialogue: (laughs) True story.

transcript.speaker: Tyra Banks
transcript.dialogue: Well, I know -

transcript.speaker: Space Ghost
transcript.dialogue: Did I mention that I like to sketch?

transcript.speaker: Tyra Banks
transcript.dialogue: No.

transcript.speaker: Space Ghost
transcript.dialogue: I'm pretty deep that way. Why don't you sit still as I capture your essense in colored pencil?

transcript.speaker: Tyra Banks
transcript.dialogue: (smiles and waits uncomfortably while Space Ghost sketches)

transcript.speaker: Space Ghost
transcript.dialogue: (sketches for a long time, then looks up momentarily: sketches again) So, you're workin' it with John Stamos. That's a good one.

transcript.speaker: Tyra Banks
transcript.dialogue: That's not me! That's your next guest!

transcript.speaker: Space Ghost
transcript.dialogue: Nice try. (looks at note card) It says right here, "Ask Tyra about John Stamos".

transcript.speaker: Tyra Banks
transcript.dialogue: "Ask Tyra about John Stamos"? No, that's my good friend's fiance, and that's all I know.

transcript.speaker: Space Ghost
transcript.dialogue: (stares at note card) (to himself: My note cards have been desequencified.) This smells like the work of Zorak!

transcript.speaker: Zorak
transcript.dialogue: Yes, it was I, Zorak! Emerald rogue! Wronger of rights! Pincher of sensitive areas!

transcript.speaker: Space Ghost
transcript.dialogue: That's the best you can do.

transcript.speaker: Zorak
transcript.dialogue: Eh... I'm not myself without Moltar.

transcript.speaker: Zorak
transcript.dialogue: Goodbye to you, my molten friendWe've known each otherSince we were in the penTogether we climbed hills and treesLearned assault and batterySkinned our hearts and skinned our knees.

transcript.speaker: Space Ghost
transcript.dialogue: You're losin' your edge.

transcript.speaker: Rags
transcript.dialogue: (Bark! Bark! Bark! Bark! Bark! Bark!)

transcript.speaker: Zorak
transcript.dialogue: (on monitor) (hisses at Rags)

transcript.speaker: Rags
transcript.dialogue: (Bark! Bark! Bark! Bark!)

transcript.speaker: Zorak
transcript.dialogue: (evil laugh)

transcript.speaker: Space Ghost
transcript.dialogue: What'd he say?

transcript.speaker: Zorak
transcript.dialogue: He had a question about the, um... component.

transcript.speaker: Space Ghost
transcript.dialogue: (looks up, then resumes sketching)

transcript.speaker: Tyra Banks
transcript.dialogue: (smiling uncomfortably) Space Ghost, you're so...

transcript.speaker: Space Ghost
transcript.dialogue: I'm really creative. Sometimes I wear an eyepatch because I'm so creative.

transcript.speaker: Tyra Banks
transcript.dialogue: I have no idea...

transcript.speaker: Space Ghost
transcript.dialogue: Plus, I'm mysterious. People wonder about me.

transcript.speaker: Tyra Banks
transcript.dialogue: Yeah.

transcript.speaker: Space Ghost
transcript.dialogue: (finishes sketching) Okay. Take a look at this. (holds up sketch titled "Tyra!", with badly drawn caricature) That's you! Pretty good, huh?

transcript.speaker: Tyra Banks
transcript.dialogue: (pained look) It's okay.

transcript.speaker: Space Ghost
transcript.dialogue: Ever get a big zit on your back?

transcript.speaker: Tyra Banks
transcript.dialogue: (disgusted look)

transcript.speaker: Space Ghost
transcript.dialogue: Tyra? Tyra... (invisos back to control room)

transcript.speaker: Space Ghost
transcript.dialogue: Bad director! Bad director! What the... My retainer!

transcript.speaker: Moltar
transcript.dialogue: Please strike out, please strike out, please strike out, please strike - (CRACK!) Oh no... Please go to the fence, please go to the fence, please go to the fence, please go to the fence... (BALL DROPS AND ROLLS JUST PAST HIM; HE JUST STANDS THERE)

transcript.speaker: Voice
transcript.dialogue: Moltar! (Japanese cursing)

transcript.speaker: Space Ghost
transcript.dialogue: Please welcome my next guest, Rebecca Romijn.

transcript.speaker: Rebecca Romijn
transcript.dialogue: (voice only) Hello, Space Ghost!

transcript.speaker: Space Ghost
transcript.dialogue: Rebecca? Where are you?

transcript.speaker: Rebecca Romijn
transcript.dialogue: (on monitor) Hello? Hello, hello, hello?

transcript.speaker: Space Ghost
transcript.dialogue: Rebecca, turn off your inviso-power.

transcript.speaker: Rebecca Romijn
transcript.dialogue: I'm here, I'm here, I'm right here.

transcript.speaker: Space Ghost
transcript.dialogue: Oh no! Can it be? Have I lost the gift of sight in not one, but both eyes?

transcript.speaker: Zorak
transcript.dialogue: Simmer down there, Sandra Dee.

transcript.speaker: Space Ghost
transcript.dialogue: (looking up) Zorak? Is that you? My oldest and truest evil bandleader? (turns and looks to his left) Oh, Zorak, it is you! I can see! I can see! This is the happiest day of my life!

transcript.speaker: Zorak
transcript.dialogue: (walks up to Space Ghost as he speaks) (belches, and blows it on Space Ghost)

transcript.speaker: Space Ghost
transcript.dialogue: You probably think that's cool.

transcript.speaker: Space Ghost
transcript.dialogue: (invisos in) Miss Romijn?

transcript.speaker: Rebecca Romijn
transcript.dialogue: Where am I? What's going on right now?

transcript.speaker: Space Ghost
transcript.dialogue: This is Space Ghost here. Over.

transcript.speaker: Rebecca Romijn
transcript.dialogue: Hello, Space Ghost.

transcript.speaker: Space Ghost
transcript.dialogue: Sorry for the difficulty, Rebecca. Somebody seems to have slobbered on all the settings. Over.

transcript.speaker: Rags
transcript.dialogue: (Bark! Bark!)

transcript.speaker: Rebecca Romijn
transcript.dialogue: Who was that, what was that weird noise?

transcript.speaker: Space Ghost
transcript.dialogue: Nothing. Hang tight for a sec. Over and out. (presses a console button, sends Rebecca to the studio monitor)

transcript.speaker: Rebecca Romijn
transcript.dialogue: Oh, good, thank you.

transcript.speaker: Rags
transcript.dialogue: (continues to growl and thrash the rug back and forth)

transcript.speaker: Space Ghost
transcript.dialogue: You're worse than Molton! (bounds back to his desk) Please welcome my next guest, super-model Rebecca Romijn.

transcript.speaker: Rebecca Romijn
transcript.dialogue: Thank you, it's really exciting to be here, thanks.

transcript.speaker: Space Ghost
transcript.dialogue: Yes, yes, enough about me, let's talk about you. Now, you do runway modeling occasionally, right?

transcript.speaker: Rebecca Romijn
transcript.dialogue: That's right.

transcript.speaker: Space Ghost
transcript.dialogue: Okay, when you're walking down the runway...

transcript.speaker: Rebecca Romijn
transcript.dialogue: Yeah...

transcript.speaker: Space Ghost
transcript.dialogue: Do ya ever get the urge to just run and take off like an XG series pulse-modulated Donovan craft?

transcript.speaker: Rebecca Romijn
transcript.dialogue: Well, you know, sometimes when I'm walking down the runway, all I'm wearing are, are underpants.

transcript.speaker: Space Ghost
transcript.dialogue: Uh, ahh.... (falls over at his desk, his feet stick up in the air)

transcript.speaker: Rebecca Romijn
transcript.dialogue: Oh no... are you okay?

transcript.speaker: Space Ghost
transcript.dialogue: (gets up) Were you just hitting on me?

transcript.speaker: Rebecca Romijn
transcript.dialogue: You're kind of intimidating me, Space Ghost, that strong jaw, and those, those, those, those, those intense eyes.

transcript.speaker: Space Ghost
transcript.dialogue: Yeah. And how about my generous biceps?

transcript.speaker: Rebecca Romijn
transcript.dialogue: (laughs) Well, they're, they're intimidating too.

transcript.speaker: Space Ghost
transcript.dialogue: You mean it? You're not just blowing smoke up my cape.

transcript.speaker: Rebecca Romijn
transcript.dialogue: I, I do, I love you, Space -

transcript.speaker: Space Ghost
transcript.dialogue: Rebecca? NO! (invisos to control room)

transcript.speaker: Rags
transcript.dialogue: (Bark! Bark! Bark! Bark! Bark! Bark! Bark! Bark!)

transcript.speaker: Space Ghost
transcript.dialogue: Well that's it, pal, your directing days are over. I'm sending you back to the minors. Zorak, bring the car around)

transcript.speaker: Space Ghost
transcript.dialogue: Moltar! Get in the car!

transcript.speaker: Moltar
transcript.dialogue: Seven errors! Gah... Seven!

transcript.speaker: Space Ghost
transcript.dialogue: Forget it, Moltar. It's Chinatown.

transcript.speaker: Voice
transcript.dialogue: Moltar! (more Japanese cursing)
